"$(0) Subjugation":
"Be on guard, there seems to be an enemy in the area!
Please subdue them quickly."

"Confirmed the extermination of the enemy!
Thank you for the rapid response."

"The enemy has withdrawn.
...For the time being, the threat is gone."
"/voice11_voice_navi001_trial_0001_002 Confirmed strong enemy presence! This one normally can't be found in that area. Please be careful!"
"/voice11_voice_navi001_trial_0001_069 Enemy defeated! Many thanks for taking care of it."
"/voice11_voice_navi001_trial_0001_073 The enemy is withdrawing. Don't chase after it; let's focus on other objectives."

"その付近に強力なエネミーがいるようです！
至急、対応をお願いします。"

"エネミーへの対応、
ありがとうございます。"
"Ah... We've detected the presence of some unique enemies. We need more data on them, so please take care of it."
"I expected nothing less from you, <%me>. Thanks for your assistance."
"Enemy withdrawal confirmed... Don't worry about it. Let's just move forward!"
